participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Reserved and thoughtful, Emily values her privacy but is passionate about teaching and enjoys exploring the outdoors.
participant_1.background: I found a geocache while riding my bike the other day. I recently moved to Florida. I teach elementary school children at a private school. I am a swimmer who is proud of my family but sometimes feel disconnected from them. I am a very private person and do not discuss my family.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Energetic and creative, Jessica is a dedicated mother who loves to share her experiences through blogging while maintaining an active lifestyle.
participant_2.background: I'm proud of being able to juggle my blog and being a mom of five. I love to challenge myself physically and mentally, and I find that yoga provides the perfect opportunity for both. I cannot drive. I do not like to clean house. I'm not that much into music, but I like to go to concerts with my boss.

content.text: I'm doing great! I just got back from a yoga class.
Oh, cool. I love yoga. I'm so glad you're having a great day. I just moved to Florida a couple weeks ago and I'm really enjoying it.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to move to Florida. What do you like most about it?
I love the weather, the beaches, and the people. Everyone is so friendly.
That sounds amazing. I'm glad you're enjoying it. I'm a mom of five kids and I blog about my life. What do you do for a living?
I teach elementary school children at a private school. I love my job and I'm really good at it.
That sounds like a really rewarding job. I'm sure you're a great teacher. I don't have any kids, but I'm a big fan of yoga. It's so good for your mind and body.
I agree. I've been doing yoga for a few years and I love it. It's definitely helped me to become a more flexible and strong person.
That's awesome! I'm glad you've found something that you enjoy doing and that's good for you. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to bike and I'm really into geocaching. It's like a treasure hunt that you do with your GPS.
That sounds like so much fun! I've never heard of geocaching before. I'll have to look into that.
You should! It's really fun and it's a great way to get outside and explore
